column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////LOVE LOVE LOVE Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.  We always sit in the bar at the same middle table by the window....usually because getting a dining table usually always requires a wait and the bar is first come first serve...now its just become 'our table' every time we go.  Food is always great
column3: and I have never received bad service here.  One of our favs
